name: Søren Lauesen
content: Søren Lauesen - IT-University of Copenhagen Søren Lauesen Cand. scient, math and physics Professor Emeritus, Software Engineering https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2300-6934 Emailslauesenitudk 20072022 Research activity per year Personal profile CurriculumWorked 20 years in the IT industry plus 30 years as a professor. Experience as consultant in many areas. Industry projects: Compilers, operating systems, process control, quality assurance. Research areas: User interface design, data visualization, electronic health records, requirements specification for large systems, acquisition of large systems and why they often fail, connecting business and IT. http://www.itu.dk/people/slauesen/index.html KeywordsUser interface designData visualizationElectronic health recordsRequirements specificationAcquisition of large systemsBusiness and IT Fingerprint Dive into the research topics where Søren Lauesen is active.
